title: Mark Drakeford – 2022 Comments on the Resignation of Liz Truss
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Mark Drakeford, the Welsh First Minister, on Twitter on 20 October 2022.
content:
This has been a complete and utter failure of government with everyone in this country now having to pay the price.
